The countries will report Moscow to the Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons for an alleged breach of the Chemical Weapons Convention.

'Politics of negativity': Piyush Goyal rejects Rahul's concerns over India-US trade deal
description: Union minister Piyush Goyal attacked Rahul Gandhi over the India-US trade deal, accusing him of "foolishness" and "sabotaging India's growth." Goyal countered Gandhi's claims about hurting farmers and exporters, highlighting the potential for textile market growth and job creation. He also pointed out that Gandhi's party initiated policies allowing duty-free import of raw materials for exports.

description: Gamophobia, the fear of commitment or marriage, is a growing concern, extending beyond simple jitters to a deep-seated emotional resistance. This phenomenon, fueled by increased choice, individualism, and witnessing relationship breakdowns, is prompting individuals to question traditional marital structures and redefine what love and commitment entail in the modern world.

One LED light glitches at wedding venue, electrician shot dead in Gurgaon
description: An electrician, Barkat, was fatally shot at a wedding in Gurgaon after an LED light malfunctioned, leading to an argument with the groom, Amandeep. While Amandeep allegedly fired the first missed shot, an associate, Harsh, is accused of firing the fatal bullet from behind. The victim, a father of three, was a resident of Mathura.

title: 4 family members die after consuming methanol ‘mistaken for liquor’
'Yellow sari, sindoor, mangalsutra': In new video, ‘Naagin’ woman resurfaces with lover
description: A young woman, Reena, who vanished from her home in Auraiya, leaving behind a snake slough and sparking 'naagin' rumors, has reappeared claiming a willing marriage. In videos, she asserts her choice to be with her lover, urging an end to the pursuit. Police are investigating her elopement, which followed a period of alleged fascination with snakes.

title: 'Girls, djinn rituals': Arrested ‘occultist’ modus operandi emerges in Delhi triple murder probe
Team Canada rules out Brad Marchand, Josh Morrissey vs Switzerland
description: Team Canada faces Switzerland at the 2026 Winter Olympics without key players Josh Morrissey and Brad Marchand. Morrissey is sidelined with an undisclosed injury sustained against Czechia, while Marchand's absence remains unexplained. Seth Jarvis is set to make his Olympic debut, replacing Morrissey on the third line, with Travis Sanheim also stepping into the lineup.

title: Candace Owens calls claims about Erika Kirk 'absolutely vile'
description: A viral post has intensified debate over Candace Owens’ use of the term grooming in reference to a 15 year old. Critic Natly Denise accused Owens of exaggerating the situation, while Owens cited details from her own interview describing limited in person contact and online messages. The clash highlights ongoing tensions over how serious terms are defined and used in public commentary.

title: Cisco president Jeetu Patel says company will never hire these developers
description: Cisco's president Jeetu Patel mandates AI for all developers, aiming for half a dozen AI-coded products by 2026. This shift to spec-driven development sees human teams shrink, with AI agents tripling output. While embracing AI's potential, Cisco is investing heavily in security to prevent rogue agents, urging developers to master AI to stay relevant.

title: After CEO asked employees to stop coding, Nvidia engineers get access to OpenAI's Codex
description: Nvidia has deployed OpenAI's Codex AI coding tool to all 30,000 engineers, marking a significant enterprise rollout. CEO Jensen Huang's mandate to automate tasks with AI is driving this adoption, with engineers praising the tool's ability to handle complex workflows and maintain context.
